SOURCE.SQL: SELECT OMC_ID, BSS_ID, OP_TEAM, OMC_NM, SYS_ID, EQP_TP_CD, CATS_EQP_NO, CATS_EQP_NM, ACT_NO, ACT_STEP_NM, ACT_GRP, ACT_GRP_NO, ACT_CMD, DIS_CMD, DESC_CONTS, REG_ID, REG_DTTI FROM TB_SOP_TEMP2 WHERE REG_DTTI > #{201901010000:REG_DTTI:MAX}

TARGET.SQL: INSERT INTO TB_SOP_TEMP (OMC_ID, BSS_ID, OP_TEAM, OMC_NM, SYS_ID, EQP_TP_CD, CATS_EQP_NO, CATS_EQP_NM, ACT_NO, ACT_STEP_NM, ACT_GRP, ACT_GRP_NO, ACT_CMD, DIS_CMD, DESC_CONTS, REG_ID, REG_DTTI) VALUES (#{OMC_ID}, #{BSS_ID}, #{OP_TEAM}, #{OMC_NM}, #{SYS_ID},#{EQP_TP_CD}, #{CATS_EQP_NO}, #{CATS_EQP_NM}, #{ACT_NO}, #{ACT_STEP_NM}, #{ACT_GRP}, #{ACT_GRP_NO}, #{ACT_CMD}, #{DIS_CMD}, #{DESC_CONTS}, #{REG_ID}, #{REG_DTTI})
